abstract.text: The Bluetooth Mesh Network configuration.

inlineContent.text: The mesh network object contains information about known Nodes, Provisioners,
Network and Application Keys, Groups and Scenes, as well as the exclusion list.
The configuration does not contain any sequence numbers, IV Index, or other
network properties that change without the action from the Provisioner.
The structire of this class is compatible with Mesh Configuration Database 1.0.1.

Disables the configuration capabilities by un-assigning Provisioner’s address.
Un-assigning an address will delete the Provisioner’s Node. This results in the
Provisioner not being able to send or receive mesh messages in the mesh network.
However, the provisioner will still retain it’s provisioning capabilities.
